title: Ep. 116: The Mailbag Episode
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald reveal ‘Who Won the Week’ (1:45) and read another letter from Taboo Island (8:45) before answering audience questions from the mailbag (16:22).
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
